title: National Parks 2021 7 x 7 Inch Monthly Mini Wall Calendar with Foil Stamped Cover by Plato, USA United States of America Scenic Nature
features: Millions of people visit America's national parks each year. Thousands volunteer to serve in and protect these precious lands that present us with such breathtaking beauty. Featuring impressive photos of America's most pristine and spectacular wilderness, this mini wall calendar will take you on an inspiring journey from towering peaks to subterranean depths, from America's shores to its awesome cliffs.

description: Plato Calendars is an independent gift publishing company founded in 1997 and headquartered in El Segundo, California. Specializing in high-quality printed products utilizing recycled paper and eco-friendly soy-based inks, Plato Calendars produces beautiful and affordable seasonal published product. Our products are available at the finest retailers. Visit our website, platocalendars.com, for more details about our company and the wide and varied range of items we offer.
"At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet." - Plato 428 - 348 BCE
